title: Iron equipment

properties.name: description
properties.value: Iron equipment are items made from iron metal. Iron equipment is stronger than bronze equipment, but weaker than steel equipment. All iron items are coloured dark-grey. Iron armour requires 1 Defence to wield, weapons require 1 Attack, which makes it a suitable alternative to bronze equipment, which has the same requirements.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Iron equipment
A player with iron armour equipped.

Iron equipment are items made from iron metal. Iron equipment is stronger than bronze equipment, but weaker than steel equipment. All iron items are coloured dark-grey. Iron armour requires 1 Defence to wield, weapons require 1 Attack, which makes it a suitable alternative to bronze equipment, which has the same requirements.

Contents

  • 1 Weapons
    • 1.1 One-handed melee weapons
    • 1.2 Two-handed melee weapons
    • 1.3 Ranged weapons and ammo
  • 2 Armour
  • 3 Other

Weapons[edit | edit source]

Iron weapons require an Attack level of 1 to wield.

Armour[edit | edit source]

Iron armour is the second-lowest quality armour in the standard spectrum of metal armours (bronze to dragon). Iron armour requires 1 Defence to wear.

Other[edit | edit source]

Trimmed and gold-trimmed iron armour have the same bonuses as standard iron armour. These can be obtained from the member's only Treasure Trails minigame.

Note: Other players cannot trim or bless armour. Players claiming to do so are scammers.
